author: Marin Tironi
title: ADAppTO
description: Its too complicated to cash in and cash out ADA through coinbase, binance and similar websites and you always lose money on fees.

assessments.note: challange not well defined. it is basically abilty to change fiat to ada with no fee. solution proposed does not address the exchange complexity or reality.

The problem statement makes sense and the problem presented is relevant, but converting FIAT to crypto is not so simple, after more than ten years of the emergence of Bitcoin, there is still no easy and unanimous way to convert FIAT to crypto without depending on any intermediate custodian.

There are no details on how the proposal will address the challenge.
This is not a proposal. More like an opinion.

Unfortunately, there are no elements in this proposal that could help us take it off in its current shape or form. More information is required to be added to have some meaningful conversation about its impact. I would suggest to think about it how cardano community at large is going to benefit with this idea and where it aligns with its goals. Adding that colour into proposal could help greatly. Stating to save the fees is not enough anymore.
More information needed on how execution will be done. Please look for a partner that can help you bring your ideas on paper

A vague problem statement with a fragmented stream of consciousness as a solution. As a single function dapp, this is not a terrible idea if implemented as a plugin or api but that was not put forward as a part of the idea.
The proposer has no experience as a developer. There is no plan. The proposal is just an idea / draft.
Send your feedback and wishes to Emurgo and maybe they will make Yoroi better: https://yoroi-wallet.com/#/support

Unable to determine. There are only few sentences in this proposal. For the future reference - please try to think about following things:

-Relevant experience of proposer.
-Whether there's a team or an individual proposer.
Implementers already committed or not.
-Sensible plan and budget for the task described.
Nothing here suggests that the project is going to be implemented.
This proposal reads more like a joke and should have been culled before reaching this point by admins. If the proposer has no experience and no plan, simple math says it will not be implemented.

There is not enough information to indicate the feasibility or how it will address the challenge. I recommend the proposer to look for people interested in implementing the proposal and with technical skills to assist in the process, through the Catalyst Discord it is possible to find interested people.
No, it basically states that the proposer doesn't know how to do this.

Please, try to add more information with regards to following that could make it more meaningful to consider when resubmitted at the later stage as an actual proposal. It reads as an idea only:
-Roadmap and milestones
-Definition of success is clear (e.g. metrics or KPIs appropriate to this challenge)
-Clear understandable description of problem and solution
-Challenges and risks have been considered
Information here is lacking. Nothing of that sort is possible without a clear road map. Ambitious? Yes. But this is just a dream that is fleeting.
Would give 0 score if I could. No relevant information was provided to speak of.

solution: "ADAppTO"-an app where one could simply convert their fiat currency into ADA and vice versa. then send ada to ada wallets or fiat to bank.
experience: I have no experience in app developing whatsoever, but thiught I might throw the idea out there.
